item.title: Addons
item.description: Phinx - Database Migration Tool Install $ composer require robmorgan/phinx Usage Read full documentation here Note We already implement phinx.php configuration file, so you don’t need run init Run as HTTP Service Install $ composer require php-pm/php-pm:dev-master Usage Read full documentation here. We already implement the bootstrap and http bridge, so just use current ppm.json $ ./vendor/bin/ppm start We benchmarked it performace on CPU Intel Core i3, 4GB RAM Laptop with PHP 7 CGI (hello world route, no database connection) : 950 requests / second.
